summary: Static permission text ‚Üí Rich, context-aware permission dialogs with full tool metadata

problem.issue: Permission dialog showed generic static text ('I will save it to your project root')
problem.limitation: Only had access to error reason string, required fragile regex parsing
problem.user_realization: Moti and Claude had SAME idea simultaneously: 'just pass the full tool object!'
problem.sync_moment: Perfect collaboration sync - both thinking same solution at exact same time ü´°

insight.key_realization: PermissionRequest was losing rich ToolInfo data in transit
insight.available_data: Full ToolInfo object exists at ConversationProcessor with target, params, all details
insight.solution: Pass entire ToolInfo as metadata - no information loss, maximum flexibility
insight.philosophy: Let UI decide what to show, don't filter data at source

phase_1_extension.after: createPermissionRequest(toolId, toolAction, reason, { target: message.tool?.target, params: message.tool?.params })
phase_1_extension.impact: Full ToolInfo now flows to UI

methods_updated: updatePermissionUI() - Added tooltip with full path
formatPermissionMessage() - Completely rewritten with rich metadata
